title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4700.5 - Time and location of inspection of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4700.5 - Time and location of inspection of records

State Regulations

Requests for public access to records of the authority shall
be accepted and such records shall be made available for public inspection at
the main office of the authority during the normal business day from 8:30 a.m. to noon and 1 p.m. to 5 p.m. No records may be removed by the applicant from
the authority's office without the written permission of the records access
officer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4700.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
